Replace.Text: No penalties to yields in occupied cities. Declaring a Surprise War only counts as a Formal War for the purpose of warmongering and war weariness. Capturing a city restores [ICON_Movement] Movement to all units, and automatically repairs that city's buildings and districts.

Receive a [ICON_Governor] Governor Title for the first city you capture from each civilization, including city-states. Capturing a city restores [ICON_Movement] Movement to all units, and automatically repairs that city's buildings and districts. +5 Loyalty per turn in cities with a garrisoned unit, doubled if that city also has an established [ICON_Governor] Governor.

Claim the crown, Cyrus, King of Persia, for you are the anointed one. With immortal soldiers, you will conquer and rule the peoples of the world. You may see many alliances forming around you, but do not be fooled - such is an antiquated and weak way of navigating the world. Make no promise unless it aids you in achieving your goals.
Conquest is a truth every leader must embrace if he is to increase the glory of his realm. Act, before you are beaten like a filthy carpet.

+1 [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route capacity per established [ICON_Governor] Governor. Receive +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture for routes between your own cities, and domestic routes to cities with an established [ICON_Governor] Governor also receive the base yields for international routes. Roads built in your territory are one level more advanced than usual.

Persian unique melee unit that replaces the Swordsman. Melee class unit with a ranged attack, [ICON_Range] Range 2. Trained 50% faster in your [ICON_Capital] Capital when you have less than 10. +5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when you have at least 10.

Unlocks the Builder ability to construct a Pairidaeza, unique to Persia.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and +2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold. +1 Appeal. +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture for each adjacent Holy Site, Theater Square, or Natural Wonder. +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold for each adjacent Commercial Hub and City Center. Additional [ICON_Culture] Culture and [ICON_Tourism] Tourism as you advance through the Technology and Civics Tree. Cannot be built on Snow, Tundra, Snow Hills, or Tundra Hills or adjacent to another Pairidaeza.
